column4: hi. I using Ubuntu Dapper 6.06. In Firefox, when I click 'Help --> About' it says version 1.5.4. I want to upgrade to at least 1.5.9, or better still version 2. I've tried to use Synatpic package manager and it says it has updated it, but still reported as 1.5.4. I also tried 'sudo apt-get install firefox' but says I have the latest version already? What gives?
You can simply install the 1.54 package and install firefox 2 from the website, no need to upgrade ubuntu if you're happy with dapper!
